Text:
I don't know hat's up with the encodes lately but they freeze on my Panasonic bluray player bdt-210.
I have to run them through Handbrake to fix.
Thumbs down for not making these vids more compatible with off-the-shelf players.

@shapeshifter910 Stick that thumb up your ass cause nobody cares what you think. It looks like there is about 25000 thumbs up already (suck it).

He should not have to make sure it works with every device known to man. Thats your responsibility. Understand? Thats your fucking problem. But if it makes you feel better to blame someone other than your own dumbass, go for it whilst we all laugh at your ass. LOL!
